Installing GripperSDK

Step 1: Prepare Python Development Environment

GripperSDK depends on XenseSDK, so a Python development environment needs to be installed. Please refer to XenseSDK for Python development environment preparation.

Step 2: Install GripperSDK Package

pip install xensegripper

Tips

The latest version of GripperSDK can be obtained from the official Github website.
